Order axis variables

Source: R/ggparcoord.R
singleClassOrder.Rd

Order axis variables by separation between one class and the rest (most separation to least).

singleClassOrder(classVar, axisVars, specClass = NULL)

Arguments

classVar

class variable (vector from original dataset)
axisVars

variables to be plotted as axes (data frame)
specClass

character string matching to level of classVar; instead of looking for separation between any class and the rest, will only look for separation between this class and the rest

Value

character vector of names of axisVars ordered such that the first variable has the most separation between one of the classes and the rest, and the last variable has the least (as measured by F-statistics from an ANOVA)

Author

Jason Crowley crowley.jason.s@gmail.com

Contents

Developed by Barret Schloerke, Di Cook, Joseph Larmarange, Francois Briatte, Moritz Marbach, Edwin Thoen, Amos Elberg, Jason Crowley.
